openstack_objectstorage_object_v1.description: Manages a V1 container object resource within OpenStack.

content_disposition.description: A string which specifies the override behavior for

content_encoding.description: A string representing the value of the Content-Encoding

delete_at.description: An string representing the date when the system removes the object.

etag.description: Used to trigger updates. The only meaningful value is ${md5(file("path/to/file"))}.
